title: Grand Finalist Smart India Hackathon 2023!
description: NyayaSarthiNyayaSarthi Nov 2023 - PresentNov 2023 - Present          In the Smart India Hackathon 2023, we developed a comprehensive full-stack solution leveraging ReactJS, TypeScript, Node.js, and MongoDB. Our project involved training a custom Large Language Model (LLM) with several gigabytes of data, which we fine-tuned using Google‚Äôs Vertex AI. We created a Flask-based API to facilitate access to the LLM, which was instrumental in streamlining the handling of court cases in India.
author: Issued by Government of India
